title: Welcome to Term 1, 2025
content: Welcome back to TODO: SCHOOL_NAME! We hope you had a restful break. Please check your timetables and contact the office if you have any questions.

title: Staff Meeting — Friday 3:30 PM
content: Reminder: staff meeting this Friday at 3:30 PM in the staffroom. Agenda: assessment policy review and upcoming events.

title: Swimming Carnival — March 5
content: The annual swimming carnival will be held on March 5 at the local aquatic centre. Permission forms are due by February 28. See your homeroom teacher for details.

title: System Maintenance Notice
content: Planned maintenance window: Saturday Feb 22, 10 PM – Sunday Feb 23, 6 AM. The system may be briefly unavailable.
